text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Race Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Other or unknown or refused to answer

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Race Category Excluding Nulls

name: DetailedRace
title: Detailed Race
description: The codes for the concepts 'Unknown', 'Asked but no answer', 'other, and the 900+ [CDC Race codes](http://www.cdc.gov/phin/resources/vocabulary/index.html) that are grouped under one of the 5 OMB race category codes.
